title: thresh_peaks
text:
thresh_peaks
make_peaks.thresh_peaks(z_scores, thresh=None, method='kink')
Find peaks by calling z-scores above a threshold as a peak.

title: hmm_peaks
text:
make_peaks.hmm_peaks(z_scores, i_to_p=1 / 1000, p_to_p=1 / 1.5, peak_center=10, spread=2)
Fit peaks to the provided z_scores data set using the vertibi algorithm.









Type
Description




-peaks: a 2xn array with the first column being position and the second
column being a peak assignment.

title: hmm_peaks
text:
Type
Description




-peaks: a 2xn array with the first column being position and the second
column being a peak assignment.

title: bowtie_to_peak
text:
end_to_end.bowtie_to_peak(bowtie_file, thresh=12, peak_file=None)
Convert bowtie aligned file to peaks for 5r, 5f, 3r, and 3f.





Type
Description




-peaks: str path to the location of the peaks file.

title: bowtie_to_peak
text:
Type
Description




-peaks: str path to the location of the peaks file.

title: bowtie_to_peak_remove_shadows
text:
end_to_end.bowtie_to_peak_remove_shadows(bowtie_file, thresh=12)
Convert bowtie aligned file to peaks after shadow removal.









Type
Description




-peaks: str path to the location of the peaks file (called
after shadow removal).

title: bowtie_to_peak_remove_shadows
text:
Type
Description




-peaks: str path to the location of the peaks file (called
after shadow removal).

title: Function reference
text:
Functions to go from alignment to peaks



bowtie_to_peak
Convert bowtie aligned file to peaks for 5r, 5f, 3r, and 3f.


bowtie_to_peak_remove_shadows
Convert bowtie aligned file to peaks after shadow removal.






Functions to call peaks from Rend-seq data.



hmm_peaks
Fit peaks to the provided z_scores data set using the vertibi algorithm.


thresh_peaks
Find peaks by calling z-scores above a threshold as a peak.
